Description:
Roundforest is on a mission to help busy people make shopping decisions with peace of mind. We’re looking for a passionate candidate who gets excited about the opportunity to join our journey and impact 40,000,000 consumers (and counting).
Senior Product Designer objective:
As a Senior Product Designer at Roundforest, you will be responsible for creating friendly, visually appealing and usable products. You will own the design of one of our products and work collaboratively with your pod (product manager, engineers, data analysts) as well as your guild (other product designers) to deliver high-quality products that meet the needs of our users.
**Please attach an updated portfolio to your application**
At Roundforest, we value creative thinking and therefore often will do things differently. Accordingly, Roundforest's Senior Product Designer role may differ in a few ways from similar positions out there:
Our product designers work as part of a product pod, which is a bit like a little start up within a start up. Instead of designers working in isolation or only with other designers, here they closely collaborate with cross-functional individuals (product managers, data analysts, engineers) to create impactful solutions that address real user problems. By working in pods, designers are able to fully immerse themselves in the product and gain a deep understanding of the user's needs. This approach fosters a culture of innovation and creativity, and enables us to deliver products that truly resonate with our users.
Finally, we’re looking for candidates with a ׳hop margin׳ - a secret ingredient we look for in all new hires. In other words, this position requires the candidate to leap into the next phase of their career and to step outside their comfort zone, while maintaining a reasonable learning curve. Let's evolve together!
